meanings.sent2: The designer bag is too expensive for me to buy.
meanings.sent3: I can't afford that expensive ice cream cone!
meanings.sent4: Her taste in jewelry is as expensive as a diamond mine.
meanings.sent5: The expensive car gleamed in the sunlight, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: His decision to study abroad was expensive in terms of time and money.
meanings.sent2: The project turned out to be more expensive than we had anticipated.
meanings.sent3: Trying to keep up with the latest fashion trends can be quite expensive.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was an expensive investment, but worth every penny.
meanings.sent5: The journey to success is often paved with expensive lessons and sacrifices.
